articles.title: Do Revenge review – biting Netflix comedy updates Strangers on a Train - The Guardian
articles.description: Camila Mendes and Maya Hawke play teens swapping revenge plots in this enjoyable, if overlong, throwback teen comedy
articles.content: Do Revenge, a sharp Netflix dark comedy starring Camila Mendes and Maya Hawke as vengeance-obsessed high schoolers, is a virtual parade of teen movie nostalgia a shopping mall of homages, if you will… [+4927 chars]
